title: Physical Foundations CmpE
description: Basic principles governing the physical realization of computing systems and their relationship to characteristics such as performance, energy, and robustness.  Implementation technologies.
restrictions: __HEADER_0__Must be enrolled in one of the following Campuses:
prerequisites: (ECE 2020 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of C or ECE 2030 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of C) and ECE 2040 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of C
